u.a: WAW loads his car with blocks . blocks fall down .
Wawrzon is playing with his toy car, he gives it to Katarzyna.
WAW derives the imperative form the infinitive "odwiązać".
WAW looks at an empty chocolate box .
WAW plays with blocks . he destroys what he has built .
HAN takes the toy WAW wanted to throw .
when talking to WAW Katarzyna calls him "łebku", a diminutive of "head". after a while WAW starts repeating it .
that's enough of it or you'll hurt yourself .
FAT wants WAW to talk about a recent visit to the car wash .
the Polish translation of "to hurt oneself" is "to do harm".
did you tell the lady where we took the car ?
tell us because the lady doesńt know what it is .
KAT takes WAW from the sofa and puts him on the floor .
tell us, the machines were revolving and what ?
so what was the car washed with ?
well, but there wasńt any water .
WAW wants to go to his mother to the other room .
WAW is running, he falls down several times .
I am going by bike to the construction site .
WAW is looking at the back side of his bike .
it smokes . it smokes from the pipe here .

WAW rides the bike towards HAN .
I am riding my bike onto auntie .
then auntie wońt come here any more if you keep riding into me .
I am riding . it is smoking from the pipe here .

so you have a racing motorcycle here, right ?

mother is trying to get WAW interested in something else . she is looking for a string .
I had it in my hand a minute ago .
all gone . let go, let go .
KAT picks up a book about cats . Wawrzon becomes interested in it .
and this kitten is sad . why is it so sad, Wawrzuś ?
and what is this cat doing here ?
and what is the hen bringing for him ?
a bucket . (it) is carrying a bucket .
and what did this kitten do ?
a ball . the ball flew away . the second ball ...
WAW looks at the wall . there is a picture on it made by Wawrzon .
and what was it supposed to be ?
KAT shows WAW a book about airplanes .
tell us now what is happening here .
and what is going on in this car wash ?
an airplane . it's a car wash .

an airplane or a car wash ?
WAW goes to the other room .
MOT tries to talk WAW out of it, but he still wants to turn on the record player .
mom . to turn on . turn on . turn on the record player .

g.ga: a glass with an airplane on it

u.a: I'll pour it for you (in the glass) with an airplane, ok ?
WAW really wants to drink from a bottle just like adult men .
I'll give you such red juice, do you want it ?
red . I want from the bottle .
we only drink milk form the bottle, right ?
but this juice wońt go through, because it's too thick, you know ?
it wońt go through the bottle .
WAW plays with a chair . he pretends that the chair is a car . the chair falls down making a lot of noise .
now the lady (downstairs) will yell (at us) . stand up .
it's not allowed . for sure the doggy got scared too .
WAW takes another chair and pretends it is a train .
well Wawrzon, what are you doing ?
WAW creates "spychara" by analogy to "betoniara, kopara".
no, I dońt want to, no .
WAW is in his room . KAT wants him to draw something .
am I to draw a shovel ?
I am not good at it .
KAT draws the picture and makes some comments .
a man is sitting in the shovel .
KAT is drawing . WAW becomes interested in the chair again .
but men drink from such glasses with an airplane on them .
from the bottle they drink at the kiosk .
from the bottle from the bottle .
show auntie how you can drink from a glass .
FAT seats WAW on the chair and pretends that he is also drinking . FAT has a small glass in his hand .
WAW looks at the bag with the tape recorder that HAN carries on her shoulder .
ask auntie if she will have some tea .
WAW has drunk his juice and wants more .
WAW pours some juice to his father's glass and wants him to drink .
WAW notices a picture on the wall . the picture presents a man who is drinking .
in the drawing the man is also drinking .

WAW pours more water into his dad's glass . dad drinks it .
I am drinking . auntie, I am drinking .
what do you have the tape recorder for ?
it's not a taperecorder, it's a bag .
you went to the store with daddy . how many did you break ?
FAT wants WAW to tell about his visit at the forest ranger's cottage .
have you been at the forest ranger's cottage at all ?
KAT asks more questions but WAW ignores them . he becomes interested in the hole in the bag .
but it's not very big, such a small hole .
there is no other one, there is only one .
auntie will have to sew it .
on a sewing machine, you know ?
where do you have the (sewing) machine ?
at home I have such a machine and I'll sew this hole up .
the expression means that he was wearing big galoshes .
